{{Description|"The clouds cut the lunar light, like shadows silver gracing one's sight."}}
'''Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance''' is [[Lan Yan]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|a thrown Feathermoon Ring|3}}
* The thrown Feathermoon Rings will deal three instances of Anemo DMG total, even if there is only one opponent.
** This increases to six instances of Anemo DMG with her first Constellation Level.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|Four Sealing Divination Charms}}
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Skyfeather Evil-Subduing Charm}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|1|"As One Might Stride Betwixt the Clouds"|After unlocking and triggering the Passive Talent [[Four Sealing Divination Charms]], when Lan Yan hurls her Feathermoon Rings, the number of hits will be doubled.}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|2|"Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade"}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|"On White Wings Pierce Through Cloud and Fog"}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|"Let Us Away on Sylphic Wing, the Silvered Ornaments to Ring"}}
